Package org.forgerock.openidm.auth

Creates Authenticators and sets up the AuthenticationService.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Authenticator
    Authenticates a user given a username and password combination.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AuthenticationService
    Configures the authentication chains based on authentication.json.
    Authenticator.AuthenticatorResult
    The result of the Authenticator#authenticate.
    AuthenticatorFactory
    A factory Function to build an Authenticator from an auth module config.
    AuthFilterWrapper
    A CHF Filter to wrap the AuthenticationFilter, so that config changes may swap out the CAF AuthenticationFilter without disturbing the CHF FilterChain.
    IDMAuditApi
    Creates audit entries for each authentication attempt.

Package org.forgerock.openidm.auth Description

Creates Authenticators and sets up the AuthenticationService.
